thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 02 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Tyler Technologies Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.95

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tyler Technologies Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.95
text:
May 2 (Reuters) - Tyler Technologies Inc:
* TYLER TECHNOLOGIES REPORTS EARNINGS FOR FIRST QUARTER 2018
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.13
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.95 * Q1 REVENUE $221.2 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $219.3 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.12 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE ABOUT $4.73 TO $4.83
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE ABOUT $3.34 TO $3.44
* 2018 GAAP TOTAL REVENUES ARE EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $933 MILLION TO $949 MILLION
* 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $22 MILLION AND $25 MILLION
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $4.78, REVENUE VIEW $925.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
